Uses of Class
common.messages.CommonMessage

  • Packages that use CommonMessage 
    Package Description
    app_kvClient  
    app_kvEcs

    • Uses of CommonMessage in app_kvClient

      Methods in app_kvClient that return CommonMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommonMessage KVClient.get(java.lang.String key)
      Creates a TextMessage that is then filled with required values for the get command and send to the responsible server.
      CommonMessage KVClient.merge(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a TextMessage that is then filled with required values for the put command and send to the responsible server.
      CommonMessage KVClient.put(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a TextMessage that is then filled with required values for the put command and send to the responsible server.
      Methods in app_kvClient with parameters of type CommonMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClientSocketListener.handleNewMessage(CommonMessage msg) 
      void app_KVClient.handleNewMessage(CommonMessage msg)
      Handles incoming messages on the client.

    • Uses of CommonMessage in app_kvEcs

      Methods in app_kvEcs with parameters of type CommonMessage

      Handles incoming messages on the ecs client.

    • Uses of CommonMessage in common.messages

      Methods in common.messages that return CommonMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommonMessage CommonMessage.deserialize()
      Deserializes a String received from the server.
      CommonMessage CommonMessage.serialize()
      Serializes the data of the current TextMessage into a String with format {StatusType: , key: , value: } and returns the result in a new TextMessage
